name: WordPress Content
special_instructions: The target website must have WordPress installed for this tool to work
The 'search' filter allows you to search title or content for specific keywords
The 'limit' option allows you to limit the number of results
The 'format' option allows you to choose the content format, either 'html' or 'text'
The 'url' filter is the URL of the WordPress website you want to scrape
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
